verses.roman:
svarūpa-gosāñi kahe,--"śuna, haridāsa
sabe tomāra hita vāñchi, karaha viśvāsa

synonyms: svarūpa-gosāñi kahe—Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosāñi said; śuna haridāsa—just hear, Haridāsa; sabe—all of us; tomāra hita vāñchi—wish well for you; karaha viśvāsa—just believe it.
translation: Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosāñi said, "Please hear us, Haridāsa, for we all wish you well. Please believe this.
